name: Samurott
author: rika
flavor_text: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

abilities.name: Torrential Whirlpool
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you do, switch out your opponent’s Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Energized Slash
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 more damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.
